companies.title: Bachelor of Science in Information Technology
tasks: Completed coursework in software development, database management, and network security.
Collaborated with peers on group projects involving full-stack web application development.
Participated in workshops and seminars on the latest IT industry trends and technologies.
Gained practical experience through lab work and hands-on projects in various programming languages.

companies.title: Lead Developer
tasks: Led a team of students in developing a web-based application as part of a capstone project.
Conducted research and gathered requirements to define project scope and objectives.
Designed and implemented the front-end and back-end of the application using industry-standard tools and frameworks.
Tested and deployed the application, ensuring it met the project's requirements and was fully functional.

companies.title: Volunteer IT Coordinator
tasks: Managed the parish's website and social media accounts, ensuring timely updates and engaging content.
Organized virtual events and online meetings using various platforms to keep the youth community connected.
Developed digital materials, including flyers and videos, to promote ministry activities.
Provided technical support during events and assisted in setting up IT infrastructure for parish functions.

companies.title: Volunteer Organizer
tasks: Coordinated with local organizations to identify areas in need and plan outreach activities.
Led a team of volunteers in distributing essential goods and providing basic IT training to underprivileged communities.
Organized fundraising events to support the outreach program's initiatives.
Documented the program's impact and prepared reports for stakeholders.

companies.title: Participant
tasks: Attended the Department of Information and Communications Technology (DICT) conference focused on the latest advancements in IT and telecommunications.
Participated in workshops and panel discussions on topics such as cybersecurity, digital transformation, and emerging technologies.
Networked with industry professionals, gaining insights and best practices to apply in academic and professional projects.
Presented a poster on the capstone research project, receiving feedback from experts in the field.

companies.title: Bandmaster
tasks: Directed and coordinated rehearsals, performances, and events for the band.
Selected music pieces and arranged them to suit the band’s instrumentation and skill level.
Provided mentorship and guidance to band members to improve their musical abilities.
Organized concerts and community performances, enhancing the cultural life of the institution.

companies.title: President
tasks: Led the council in planning and implementing youth programs and initiatives at the local level.
Collaborated with government agencies, NGOs, and other stakeholders to address youth-related issues.
Oversaw the development of policies and programs that empower the youth in the community.
Facilitated workshops, forums, and activities that promote leadership and civic engagement among youth.

companies.company: SAMAFIL (Samahan ng mga Mag-aaral sa Filipino)
companies.title: President
tasks: Organized cultural and educational events promoting the Filipino language and heritage.
Led the organization in advocating for the inclusion of Filipino subjects and activities in the curriculum.
Coordinated with academic departments to develop programs that enhance students’ understanding of Filipino culture.
Managed the organization's activities, including seminars, competitions, and outreach programs.

companies.title: Youth Coordinator
tasks: Coordinated youth activities and programs within the chapel community.
Organized spiritual retreats, Bible studies, and prayer meetings for the youth.
Mentored young members, providing guidance and support in their spiritual growth.
Collaborated with the parish council to integrate youth initiatives into the broader church agenda.

companies.title: Chairperson
tasks: Led the Sangguniang Kabataan in implementing youth development programs and activities within the community.
Managed the allocation of budget and resources for various youth-related projects.
Collaborated with local government units to address issues affecting the youth, including education, employment, and health.
Organized and facilitated community events, such as sports tournaments, leadership training, and environmental campaigns.

companies.title: Trainer
tasks: Provided musical training and instruction to band members, focusing on improving technical skills and performance quality.
Developed and implemented training programs tailored to the needs and abilities of individual members.
Assisted the Bandmaster in organizing and directing rehearsals and performances.
Played a key role in preparing the band for competitions and public performances.

companies.title: Member
tasks: Participated in national youth leadership programs aimed at developing leadership skills and promoting civic engagement.
Collaborated with other young leaders on projects that address social issues and promote positive change in communities.
Attended workshops, seminars, and forums on leadership, social responsibility, and community development.
Contributed to the planning and execution of youth-led initiatives and campaigns at the national level.

companies.title: Event Coordinator
tasks: Coordinated the logistics and planning of a Congressional Meet event, ensuring smooth execution.
Worked closely with congressional representatives and stakeholders to manage event schedules and requirements.
Organized and managed a team of volunteers to assist with various event tasks, including registration, security, and hospitality.
Ensured all event aspects were executed according to the plan, handling any issues that arose during the event.

companies.title: Vice Chairman
tasks: Assisted the Chairman in leading the IT Club and organizing club activities.
Coordinated with members to plan and execute tech workshops, seminars, and competitions.
Supported the development of initiatives to promote technology education and engagement among students.
Worked with the club's leadership team to address member concerns and improve club operations.

companies.title: Parish Youth Ministry Assistant Coordinator
tasks: Assisted the Parish Youth Ministry Coordinator in planning and implementing youth programs and events.
Supported the coordination of activities aimed at engaging and nurturing the youth community.
Helped manage communication between the youth ministry and other parish groups.
Contributed to the development of new initiatives and outreach efforts to enhance youth participation and growth.
